thread.title: Report: Lamar Odom Showing Slight Signs of Recovery
thread.title_full: Report: Lamar Odom Showing Slight Signs of Recovery

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Report: Lamar Odom Showing Slight Signs of Recovery
text:
Comments Lamar reportedly 'briefly fluttered open his eyes and at one point Kim Kardashian believed he squeezed her hand.' 
Newest update on Lamar Odom 's condition has emerged. It is mentioned that the former NBA star has showed off slight signs of recovery as he "briefly fluttered open his eyes and at one point Kim Kardashian believed he squeezed her hand." Entertainment Tonight was first to report the news. The outlet cited a source close to Lamar who said that the encouraging moments have given Lamar's family a "glimmer of hope" that he may recover from medically induced coma. Lamar Odom has been hospitalized in Las Vegas after he was found unconscious in a Nevada brothel. Cocaine and opiates were reportedly found in his system. Khloe Kardashian , who has split from the athlete but is still legally married to him, has been keeping vigil at his bedside in the hospital. On Wednesday afternoon, October 14, Lamar's then girlfriend Liza Morales and their two children Destiny, 17 and Lamar Jr, 13, were photographed arriving in Las Vegas to rush to the former NBA star's bedside. They were joined by Lamar's aunt JaNean Mercer.
